scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a male figure, likely Christ, standing in a landscape. He wears a reddish-brown robe and has a halo. His right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing or teaching, with two fingers extended. His left hand holds a circular object, possibly a chalice or a paten. Behind him, a stylized landscape features rolling hills, green foliage, and a distant architectural structure resembling a tower or a small church with a spire. The scene is framed by an ornate border with blue and orange decorative elements and inscribed text in Gothic script.
